question: The continued rise in the world's population is the great problem faced by humanity at the present time. What are the cause of this continue rise?Do you agree that is the great problem faced by humanity
text: over the past few decades, there has been a significant increase in the amount of population around the world. There is not doubt that this has been caused by meddical technology advanced and aging society. Therefore, In my opinion, humanity is the hugest issue that human being need to be deal with.

For instance, in the past, people who suffered from plague, there was no medication and vaccination be invented so they couldn't get treatment immedialy. Nowadays however, vaccination is gevien compulsory and therefore some of disease can be prevented. Consequently, people can have longer expentency and have better environment to dwell. According Taiwan research showed that the amount of total fertility rate in Taiwan has dropped rapidly from 4.0 to 1.218 which is the lowest in the  world  over the past 50 years. In other words, people hvae gain knowledge of contraception and tend to have less children at present time.
